g++ -O3 -march=native -mavx -ftree-vectorize -DLIKWID_PERFMON CMakeFiles/CLBM.dir/src/main.cpp.o -o CLBM  -Wl,-rpath,/apps/SPACK/0.17.1/opt/linux-almalinux8-icelake/gcc-11.2.0/gsl-2.7-kpbiypjr42ht7kwi7obccf2nafaedgwg/lib:/apps/likwid/5.3.0/lib /apps/SPACK/0.17.1/opt/linux-almalinux8-icelake/gcc-11.2.0/gsl-2.7-kpbiypjr42ht7kwi7obccf2nafaedgwg/lib/libgsl.so /apps/SPACK/0.17.1/opt/linux-almalinux8-icelake/gcc-11.2.0/gsl-2.7-kpbiypjr42ht7kwi7obccf2nafaedgwg/lib/libgslcblas.so /apps/likwid/5.3.0/lib/liblikwid.so /usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-redhat-linux/8/libgomp.so /usr/lib64/libpthread.so
